headline.main: Senate to Widen Inquiries on Rising Health Costs; 5 Committees Plan Hearings on Increases in Charges by Doctors and Hospitals

docs.abstract: S Sen coms plan hearings in '68 on rising cost of health care; all linked to Labor Statistics Bur studies showing hosp costs doubled and dr fees rose almost 40% in past 10 yrs; coms and subjects of hearings detailed
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Jan. 14 -- The Senate plans to widen this year its investigation of the rising cost of American health care.
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Jan. 14 -- The Senate plans to widen this year its investigation of the rising cost of American health care.
